FuelTypeSustnUom.name: FuelTypeSustnUom
FuelTypeSustnUom.description: Represents a mapping between the additional fuel types and their corresponding unit of measure values defined by a customer.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the record.

FuelType.description: The name of the fuel type that's mapped to the unit of measure. For custom fuels, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_wood, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, custom_wood.

Language.description: The language associated with this record.

MasterLabel.description: The label assigned to this object.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Limit: 15 characters.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The name for the unit of measure that's mapped to the fuel type. For custom fuel unit of measure, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_bundle, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, custom_bundle.
